info.name: Dominoes
info.attribution:
The game layout was done by LawDawg and released to the public domain as CC0.

The library image is CC0:
https://www.publicdomainpictures.net/en/view-image.php?image=305475&picture=vintage-dominoes-game.

The background image by Martin Stokow is CC0: https://publicdomainpictures.net/en/view-image.php?image=370218&picture=grunge-background-texture-marble.
info.description: Classic tile-based strategy game using dominoes with 0 to 15 pips.  Multiple rule variations and winning conditions.
info.helpText: Players sit in seats. Press settings button (gear icon) to choose domino set to use and scoring options. Add dominoes to hand by pressing + buttons on bottom left. Calculate score. Deal next hand by pressing recall button (icon above gear).

fields.label: Which set do you want to play with?

fields.text: Do you want to reset the game, including the scores?
Do you want to recall all dominoes?
